mapper.sql: id, keypro_problem_title, keypro_problem_content, keypro_problem_type, keypro_problem_address, keypro_problem_report_person, keypro_problem_report_time, attachment_source, delflag, yhzh, process_state, create_id, create_time,lianren, liantime ,paifaren, paifadep, paifatime,endtime, x, y, pro_id,source,sourceId
mapper.insert: insert into keypro_problem (id, keypro_problem_title, keypro_problem_content, keypro_problem_type, keypro_problem_address, keypro_problem_report_person, keypro_problem_report_time, attachment_source, delflag, yhzh, x, y) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{keyproProblemTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyproProblemContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyproProblemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyproProblemAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyproProblemReportPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyproProblemReportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{attachmentSource,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{delflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{x,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{y,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,
keypro_problem_title,
keypro_problem_content,

mapper.update:
update keypro_problem
keypro_problem_title = #{keyproProblemTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
keypro_problem_content = #{keyproProblemContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
keypro_problem_type = #{keyproProblemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
keypro_problem_address = #{keyproProblemAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
keypro_problem_report_person = #{keyproProblemReportPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
keypro_problem_report_time = #{keyproProblemReportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
attachment_source = #{attachmentSource,jdbcType=CHAR},
delflag = #{delflag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update keypro_problem set keypro_problem_title = #{keyproProblemTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keypro_problem_content = #{keyproProblemContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keypro_problem_type = #{keyproProblemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keypro_problem_address = #{keyproProblemAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keypro_problem_report_person = #{keyproProblemReportPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keypro_problem_report_time = #{keyproProblemReportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, attachment_source = #{attachmentSource,jdbcType=CHAR}, delflag = #{delflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, yhzh = #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, process_state = #{processState,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lianren = #{lianren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, liantime = #{liantime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, paifaren = #{paifaren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paifadep = #{paifadep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paifatime = #{paifatime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, x = #{x,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, y = #{y,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_id = #{proId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sourceId = #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from keypro_problem where delflag != 'D'
and process_state like concat('%', #{page.state}, '%')
order by create_time desc

select count(1) from keypro_problem where delflag != 'D'
and process_state like concat('%', #{page.state}, '%')

select a.id,a.keypro_problem_title as keyproProblemTitle,a.keypro_problem_content as keyproProblemContent,a.keypro_problem_type as keyproProblemType, a.keypro_problem_address as keyproProblemAddress,a.keypro_problem_report_person as keyproProblemReportPerson, a.keypro_problem_report_time as keyproProblemReportTime,a.process_state as processState,a.create_time as createTime, a.lianren,a.liantime,a.paifaren,a.paifadep,a.paifatime,a.endtime,a.x,a.y,a.pro_id as proId,a.source,a.sourceId,b.keypro_pro_name as proName from keypro_problem a left join keypro_pro b on a.pro_id=b.id where a.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update keypro_problem set delflag = 'D' where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into keypro_problem (id, keypro_problem_title, keypro_problem_content, keypro_problem_type, keypro_problem_address, keypro_problem_report_person, keypro_problem_report_time, attachment_source, delflag, yhzh,process_state, create_id, create_time, lianren, liantime ,paifaren, paifadep, paifatime,endtime ,x, y,pro_id,source,sourceId) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{keyproProblemTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyproProblemContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{keyproProblemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyproProblemAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{keyproProblemReportPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyproProblemReportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{attachmentSource,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{delflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{processState,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lianren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{liantime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{paifaren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paifadep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paifatime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{x,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{y,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{proId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update keypro_problem set paifaren = #{paifaren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paifadep = #{paifadep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paifatime = #{paifatime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update keypro_problem set process_state=#{zt} where endtime < curdate()
mapper.select: select a.process_state as state,ifnull(b.count,0) as count from keypro_process_state as a left join( select process_state,count(id) as count from keypro_problem where delflag = 'A' group by process_state) as b on a.process_state=b.process_state
select a.*,b.shangbaoid,b.chuliren,b.chulitime,b.chulimiaoshu,b.sheheren,b.shehetime,b.shehemiaoshu from keypro_problem a,keypro_problem_chuli b where a.id=b.shangbaoid and a.process_state=#{state}

select a.*,b.shangbaoid,b.chuliren,b.chulitime,b.chulidep,b.chulimiaoshu,b.sheheren,b.shehetime,b.shehemiaoshu from keypro_problem a left join keypro_problem_chuli b on a.id=b.shangbaoid where a.id=#{id}
select id, x, y from keypro_problem where delflag = 'A' group by id

select a.id,a.keypro_problem_title as keyproProblemTitle,a.keypro_problem_content as keyproProblemContent,a.keypro_problem_type as keyproProblemType, a.keypro_problem_address as keyproProblemAddress,a.keypro_problem_report_person as keyproProblemReportPerson, a.keypro_problem_report_time as keyproProblemReportTime, a.process_state as processState,a.create_time as createTime, a.lianren,a.liantime,a.endtime,a.x,a.y, a.pro_id as proId,a.source,a.sourceId,b.keypro_pro_name as proName from keypro_problem a left join keypro_pro b on a.pro_id=b.id left join keypro_problem_chuli kpc on a.id = kpc.shangbaoid where a.delflag != 'D'
and a.keypro_problem_report_person = #{page.key} and a.process_state != '4'
and kpc.appoint_man = #{page.problemType} and a.process_state = '2'
and (kpc.appoint_man = #{page.paifaren} or a.keypro_problem_report_person = #{page.paifaren}) and a.process_state = '4'
order by a.create_time desc limit #{page.start},#{page.pageSize}

select count(1) from keypro_problem a left join keypro_pro b on a.pro_id=b.id left join keypro_problem_chuli kpc on a.id = kpc.shangbaoid where a.delflag != 'D'
and a.keypro_problem_report_person = #{page.key} and a.process_state != '4'
and kpc.appoint_man = #{page.problemType} and a.process_state = '2'
and (kpc.appoint_man = #{page.paifaren} or a.keypro_problem_report_person = #{page.paifaren}) and a.process_state = '4'

select cl.countryside_name as type,count(kp1.id) as count from keypro_problem kp1 left join keypro_pro kp2 on kp1.pro_id = kp2.id left join countrysideList cl on kp2.countryside_id = cl.id where kp1.delflag = 'A' group by cl.id
select count(id) as count,QUARTER(create_time) as quarter from keypro_problem where YEAR(create_time) = #{year} and delflag = 'A' GROUP BY QUARTER(create_time)

SELECT b.keypro_problem_type as type, count( a.keypro_problem_type ) AS count FROM keypro_problem a RIGHT JOIN news_type b ON a.keypro_problem_type = b.keypro_problem_type GROUP BY b.keypro_problem_type
mapper.update: update keypro_problem set process_state=#{processState} where id=#{id}
